WORDS: Press space bar to continue
Finally, all this statistical and software simplified knowledge need to be provided in a self learning way
to be easy to access, easy to learn and easy to apply without a formal six sigma training
Additionally, a cookbook reference will provided to refresh the HOW TO USE knowledge

SOUND_MENU: And teach you how to use

sounds.name: And teach you how to use

WORDS: The problem solving method based on A3 PDCA is very effective in non complex problems
It is simple
It is easy to learn and to apply
But it is not effective in complex problems
Press space bar to continue or use short cut to go directly to the tool assistant
Press space bar to continue
Using more data requires to use specific advanced six sigma dmaic tools to be able to transform the data in useful information and make correct conclusions
But A3 approach need to be simple and the advanced tools must be used on demand, only use them if you need them
Press space bar to continue
Press space bar to continue or click on skip button to go to assistant explanation or click on short cut icon to go directly to the tool assistant
Press space bar to continue
Problem solving method based on A3  PDCA can be enhanced to solve complex problems with few concepts
DATA DRIVEN APPROACH.  Using more data, observations, facts and representative samples  during the analysis
This reduces the human subjectivity and lets see the reality

WORDS: Press space bar to continue

Press space bar to continue
Press space bar to continue
Advanced six sigma tools are complex and not easy to learn and apply
To facilitate their learning, it is required to simplify these tools focusing only HOW TO USE them
7 steps are defined to this simplification
Press space bar to continue
Step 1: Get correct representative data (sampling) from the problem
Step 2: Select the right advanced statistical tool to be used
Step 3: Set correctly the statistical software settings (excel or Minitab)
Step 4: Understand correctly the software outputs (excel or Minitab) to make correct statistical conclusions
Step 5: Interpret correctly to apply in the problem
Press space bar to continue
This advance tool simplification needs to select specific tools with a high use frequency
Press space bar to continue
Press space bar to continue
Of course, the statistical software knowledge must be simplified considering the frequent Minitab options used

MESSAGE: This SMART TOOL will help you to link your problem solving analysis NEEDS
with the correct STATISTICAL TOOLS
and the LEARNING RESOURCES (video, cookbooks, etc)
During your problem solving analysis, you need to ask  questions what kind the ANALYSIS you need to take decisions
These QUESTIONS are grouped in general analytical approaches as comparison, evaluation, description, etc
The SMART TOOL guiding  you with key selections to find the correct STATISTICAL TOOLS
to complement your problem solving process
And finally, The SMART tool will identify the correct STATISTICAL TOOL available in the STATISTICAL SOFTWARE
At the end, The SMART tool will guide you to select the right self training video and cookbook reference
